services.name: Overgrowth Control
services.description: Ditches, fencerows, and property lines that standard mowers can't handle. We clear thick brush, tall weeds, and overgrown areas with equipment built for heavy work.

services.name: Low Hanging Branches
services.description: Removal of low branches that obstruct views, paths, or pose hazards.

services.name: Weekly Lawn Care
services.description: Regular mowing and trimming for commercial properties, rental units, and large residential lots.

services.name: Landscaping
services.description: Custom landscaping for curb appeal and outdoor functionality.

services.name: Leaf/Snow Control
services.description: Seasonal leaf cleanups and snow removal services.
